learning_objective: Create procedures with parameters to organize code and make it easier to reuse.
topic: Healthy Cooking and Food Preparation Techniques
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is compiling a digital cookbook designed to help people prepare healthful meals at home. They want a program to calculate the total cooking time for all the selected recipes. For this, Alex is thinking about creating a procedure with parameters to help with the task. Which of the following procedures would be the most appropriate to use in this situation?",
    "Answer1": "Procedure CalculateCookingTime()",
    "Answer2": "Procedure CalculateCookingTime(recipeName)",
    "Answer3": "Procedure CalculateCookingTime(recipeName, numberOfGuests)",
    "Answer4": "Procedure CalculateCookingTime(int numberOfRecipesSelected, int averageMinutesPerRecipe)",
    "CorrectAnswer": "4",
    "Explanation": "The most accurate way to calculate the total cooking time is to consider the number of selected recipes and their corresponding average cooking time per recipe. Hence, answer 4 - Procedure CalculateCookingTime(int numberOfRecipesSelected, int averageMinutesPerRecipe) - is an appropriate choice."
}
